00043         public SQLHelper(string Command, string ConnectionUsing,CommandType CommandType)
00044         {
00045             Connection = new SqlConnection(ConnectionUsing);
00046             _Command = Command;
00047             _ExecutableCommand = new SqlCommand(_Command, Connection);
00048             _ExecutableCommand.CommandType = CommandType;
00049             this._CommandType = CommandType;
00050         }
00051         #endregion
00052 
00053         #region Public Functions
00054 
00055 
00056 
00057         public void Open()
00058         {
00059             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00060             {
00061                 if (_ExecutableCommand.Connection != null)
00062                 {
00063                     _ExecutableCommand.Connection.Open();
00064                 }
00065             }
00066         }
00067 
00071         public void Close()
00072         {
00073             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00074             {
00075                 if (_ExecutableCommand.Connection != null)
00076                 {
00077                     _ExecutableCommand.Connection.Close();
00078                 }
00079             }
00080         }
00081 
00088         public void AddParameter(string ID, string Value, int Length)
00089         {
00090             if (Length == 5000)
00091             {
00092                 Length = -1;
00093             }
00094             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00095             {
00096                 if (_ExecutableCommand.Parameters.Contains(ID))
00097                 {
00098                     if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Value))
00099                     {
00100                         _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].IsNullable = true;
00101                         _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].Value = System.DBNull.Value;
00102                     }
00103                     else
00104                     {
00105                         _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].Value = Value;
00106                     }
00107                 }
00108                 else
00109                 {
00110                     SqlParameter Parameter = _ExecutableCommand.Parameters.Add(ID, SqlDbType.NVarChar, Length);
00111                     if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Value))
00112                     {
00113                         Parameter.IsNullable = true;
00114                         Parameter.Value = System.DBNull.Value;
00115                     }
00116                     else
00117                     {
00118                         Parameter.Value = Value;
00119                     }
00120                 }
00121             }
00122         }
00123 
00129         public void AddOutputParameter(string ID, SqlDbType Type)
00130         {
00131             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00132             {
00133                 if (_ExecutableCommand.Parameters.Contains(ID))
00134                 {
00135                     _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].Value = null;
00136                     _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].Direction = ParameterDirection.Output;
00137                 }
00138                 else
00139                 {
00140                     SqlParameter Parameter = _ExecutableCommand.Parameters.Add(ID, Type);
00141                     Parameter.Value = null;
00142                     Parameter.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output;
00143                 }
00144             }
00145         }
00146 
00152         public void AddOutputParameter(string ID, int Length)
00153         {
00154             if (Length == 5000)
00155             {
00156                 Length = -1;
00157             }
00158             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00159             {
00160                 if (_ExecutableCommand.Parameters.Contains(ID))
00161                 {
00162                     _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].Value = null;
00163                     _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].Direction = ParameterDirection.Output;
00164                 }
00165                 else
00166                 {
00167                     SqlParameter Parameter = _ExecutableCommand.Parameters.Add(ID, SqlDbType.NVarChar, Length);
00168                     Parameter.Value = null;
00169                     Parameter.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output;
00170                 }
00171             }
00172         }
00173 
00180         public void AddParameter(string ID, object Value, SqlDbType Type)
00181         {
00182             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00183             {
00184                 if (_ExecutableCommand.Parameters.Contains(ID))
00185                 {
00186                     if (Value == null)
00187                     {
00188                         _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].IsNullable = true;
00189                         _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].Value = System.DBNull.Value;
00190                     }
00191                     else
00192                     {
00193                         _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].Value = Value;
00194                     }
00195                 }
00196                 else
00197                 {
00198                     SqlParameter Parameter = _ExecutableCommand.Parameters.Add(ID, Type);
00199                     if (Value == null)
00200                     {
00201                         Parameter.IsNullable = true;
00202                         Parameter.Value = System.DBNull.Value;
00203                     }
00204                     else
00205                     {
00206                         Parameter.Value = Value;
00207                     }
00208                 }
00209             }
00210         }

00215         public void ExecuteReader()
00216         {
00217             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00218             {
00219                 _Reader = _ExecutableCommand.ExecuteReader();
00220             }
00221         }
00222 
00227         public int ExecuteNonQuery()
00228         {
00229             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00230             {
00231                 return _ExecutableCommand.ExecuteNonQuery();
00232             }
00233             return 0;
00234         }

00240         public object ExecuteScalar()
00241         {
00242             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)

00244                 return _ExecutableCommand.ExecuteScalar();
00245             }
00246             return null;
00247         }

00253         public bool Read()
00254         {
00255             if (_Reader != null)
00256             {
00257                 return _Reader.Read();
00258             }
00259             return false;
00260         }
00261 
00268         public object GetOutputParameter(string ID, object Default)
00269         {
00270             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00271             {
00272                 if (_ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID] != null && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(_ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].ToString()))
00273                 {
00274                     return _ExecutableCommand.Parameters[ID].Value;
00275                 }
00276             }
00277             return Default;
00278         }
00279 
00286         public object GetParameter(string ID, object Default)
00287         {
00288             if (_Reader != null)
00289             {
00290                 if (_Reader[ID] != null && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(_Reader[ID].ToString()))
00291                 {
00292                     return _Reader[ID];
00293                 }
00294             }
00295             return Default;
00296         }
00297 
00304         public object GetParameter(int Position, object Default)
00305         {
00306             if (_Reader != null)
00307             {
00308                 if (_Reader[Position] != null && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(_Reader[Position].ToString()))
00309                 {
00310                     return _Reader[Position];
00311                 }
00312             }
00313             return Default;
00314         }
00315 
00319         public void ClearParameters()
00320         {
00321             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00322             {
00323                 _ExecutableCommand.Parameters.Clear();
00324             }
00325         }

00362         private SqlDataReader _Reader = null;
00363         private CommandType _CommandType;

00366         #region IDisposable Members
00367 
00368         public void Dispose()
00369         {
00370             if (Connection != null)
00371             {
00372                 Connection.Dispose();
00373                 Connection = null;
00374             }
00375             if (_ExecutableCommand != null)
00376             {
00377                 _ExecutableCommand.Dispose();
00378                 _ExecutableCommand = null;
00379             }
00380             if (_Reader != null)
00381             {
00382                 _Reader.Dispose();
00383                 _Reader = null;
00384             }
00385         }

00387         #endregion
